summary: Liza falls in love with one of her father's employees. Her socialistic ideas about employment drive her to collide with her father and the sociopolitical status of the time.
cast: Aliki Vougiouklaki|Dimitris Papamichael|Stavros Xenidis|Labros Konstadaras|Nikitas Platis|Petros Lohaitis|Hronis Exarhakos|Aliki Zaverdinou|Hrysa Kozyri|Christos Mantzaris|Makis Giannopoulos|Nikos Tsoukas|Dinos Karydis|Giorgos Mesalas|Alekos Zartaloudis|Giorgos Gioldasis|Andreas Tsakonas|Giannis Mattos|Giannis Savvaidis|Christos Natsios|Stelios Tsolakakis|Kostas Kafasis|Filimon Methimakis|Dinos Doulgerakis|Panos Karavousanos|Thodoros Kefalopoulos|Alekos Sakellarios
title: I kori mou, i sosialistria
